This would have been the ultimate wet dream, was it just not for one thing... most of the c&c songs are in mono, just the right speaker. For instance "No Mercy" goes like:
"No No No! ... ... ... .. No! No! No! ... ... ..."
when I know it should really be:
"No No No! No Mercy! No! No! No! Mercy is for the weak."

Otherwise, friggin' awesome release =)
